titlestmt.titleproper: Stanford University, Department of Drama, Records
Guide to the Stanford University, Department of Drama, Records SC0690
titlestmt.author: Allen Wilson & Jenny Johnson

publicationstmt.publisher: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2018-03-22 13:19:56 -0700.

repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

did.unittitle: Stanford University, Department of Drama, records
did.abstract: This collection includes production books from various plays put on by the department and one box of miscellaneous records including course bulletins, syllabi, departmental pamphlets, and "A Report on the Activities of the Department of Speech and Drama and the Stanford Players, 1939-42." Accession ARCH-2012-078 contains production programs, set designs, water colors, photographs, and copies of purchase orders relating to production.
did.physdesc: Accession ARCH-2012-078: Materials are extremely fragile, as they were stored in steam tunnels beneath Memorial Hall for over 60 years.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: The records were received by the Stanford University Archives via administrative transfers from the Department of Drama.

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research; materials must be requested at least 48 hours in advance of intended use.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Stanford University, Department of Drama, Records (SC0690). Department of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

custodhist.head: Provenance
custodhist.p: Accession ARCH-2012-078: Contractors working in Memorial Hall in 2012 found two boxes of records in an unused steam tunnel under the building. These boxes were labeled “Stanford Players 1937 to 1948” and had clearly been stored there since 1948, or very soon thereafter. The two boxes were in poor condition at the time of discovery. Upon transfer to the Stanford University Archives in 2012, they were immediately sent to conservation, where they were frozen to arrest any further deterioration.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: The collection includes production books from various plays put on by the department and one box of miscellaneous records including course bulletins, syllabi, departmental pamphlets, and "A Report on the Activities of the Department of Speech and Drama and the Stanford Players, 1939-42."
Accession ARCH-2012-078 contains production programs, set designs, water colors, photographs, and copies of purchase orders relating to production.
